bill_title: Honoring Ryan Reed as the 2002 one hundred three pound South Dakota State B Wrestling Champion.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Ryan Reed as the 2002 one hundred three pound South Dakota State B Wrestling Champion. WHEREAS, Ryan Reed showed great dedication throughout his high school wrestling career and has set a standard for other student athletes to follow; and WHEREAS, Ryan was selected as Athlete of the Month at Flandreau High School for his outstanding wrestling season; and WHEREAS, Ryan is also actively involved in football, FFA, and 4-H; and WHEREAS, head coach Blake Bergjord and assistant coach Justin Richter showed great guidance in helping Ryan Reed achieve his goal in becoming the one hundred three pound South Dakota State B Wrestling Champion: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Ryan Reed be recognized for his outstanding accomplishment of winning a 2001-2002 state wrestling title and for his continued success.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Ryan Reed as the 2002 one hundred three pound South Dakota State B Wrestling Champion. WHEREAS, Ryan Reed showed great dedication throughout his high school wrestling career and has set a standard for other student athletes to follow; and WHEREAS, Ryan was selected as Athlete of the Month at Flandreau High School for his outstanding wrestling season; and WHEREAS, Ryan is also actively involved in football, FFA, and 4-H; and WHEREAS, head coach Blake Bergjord and assistant coach Justin Richter showed great guidance in helping Ryan Reed achieve his goal in becoming the one hundred three pound South Dakota State B Wrestling Champion: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Ryan Reed be recognized for his outstanding accomplishment of winning a 2001-2002 state wrestling title and for his continued success.
